content: On August 7, in Bazhou, Hebei, people from the disaster area went to the government building to seek an explanation. They were attacked with pepper spray by the police on the scene, and some people had blood on their heads.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 7, a conflict broke out in Hangzhou Wulin No. 1 Community
It is reported that a fire broke out in the community on July 15, with the 11th floor on fire. The water pressure of the ground fire hydrant was insufficient, and the fire truck could not enter the community because there was no fire climbing surface downstairs where the fire broke out. After the fire, it was determined that the fire protection facilities were unqualified and were required to be rectified.
The developer forcibly entered the community to dig and rectify, covering up the fact that the unqualified fire protection facilities passed the fire protection acceptance at that time. On the day of the start of construction, the community owners did not allow entry, resulting in a conflict.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 5, "Socialist Core Values" suddenly appeared on the streets of London 
An interventionist art action suddenly detonated the Chinese public opinion circle inside and outside the wall 
Is this an artistic creation or a patriotic act? 
Why are the young overseas students keen on enjoying freedom while criticizing freedom? After a year, Teacher Li is your teacher again, and I will talk about the London graffiti wall incident from my perspective

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Chifeng City Ningcheng County Education Bureau "proposed" employees to donate to Beijing floods.
Party members and cadres are required to donate no less than 200 yuan, and ordinary teachers are required to donate no less than 100 yuan.
The proposal did not mention Hebei and Heilongjiang, which were more severely affected, and the contact unit was the Ningcheng County Red Cross Society.
It is reported that Ningcheng County has just been removed from the national key poverty-stricken county in 2019.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Police Report

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
A villager from Fumazhuang Village, Xincheng Town, Gaobeidian, Hebei Province, wailed when he saw the devastation when he returned home after the flood receded.
The village is located in Langouwa, with low terrain and next to the spur of Baigou River, and was severely affected by the disaster.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Later, Hongqi Automobile said that the woman in the video was a customer who came to the store to buy a car, not a Hongqi employee, and the quarrel was a misunderstanding.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 8, villagers from Lianchi Village in Zhuozhou, Hebei Province exposed online that the Zhuozhou City Law Enforcement Bureau arranged trucks to dump post-flood garbage, including cat and dog carcasses, in Lianchi Village in the early morning. Lianchi Village was originally a severely affected area in this flood. It is currently very difficult to return to the village. Only trucks can go. As a result, the locals tried to dump garbage in the village while the villagers were away from home and were discovered by the staff on duty.
